# shared()

**Type Method**

Returns an app’s instance of the shared screen recorder.

## Declaration

```swift
class func shared() -> RPScreenRecorder
```

## Return Value

An `RPScreenRecorder` object.

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.replaykit/documentation/ReplayKit/RPScreenRecorder/shared()] to access the shared recorder.
